name: Opengov-working-group.GitHub.io
body: ## 2014 was a busy year for open government data, so we decided to summarise it in a simple word cloud: As 2015 is coming upon us, we want to have our own new year resolution: More topics, more sharing, more knowledge spread around. So we will all have even more open governments in the year to come. #Happy new OPEN year! Mor and the community team at Open Knowledge
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
